'''''My Heart Is Now Complete''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete the heart-shaped rock formation on the beach west of the [[Quahuacan Cliff]] Statue of the Seven.
